statements: SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_market_data;
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_market_data;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, close_price, high_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE open_price > 100;
SELECT symbol, date, low_price FROM stock_market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, close_price, date FROM stock_market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM stock_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY symbol, date DESC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(high_price) AS max_high_price FROM stock_market_data GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY max_high_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY symbol HAVING avg_close_price > 100 ORDER BY avg_close_price ASC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_market_data WHERE date = '2021-12-31' ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_data
SELECT * FROM stock_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, volume FROM stock_data WHERE open_price > 100
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Bullish' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM stock_trends
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM stock_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, open_price FROM stock_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS num_trades FROM stock_trends GROUP BY symbol HAVING num_trades >= 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_trends WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND end_date > start_date ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price, MAX(open_price) AS max_open_price FROM stock_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING avg_close_price > 50 ORDER BY max_open_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT ticker_symbol, close_price, date FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT ticker_symbol, open_price, close_price, high_price, low_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_metadata WHERE sector = 'Technology' AND industry = 'Software' ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT ticker_symbol, ex_dividend_date, dividend_amount FROM stock_dividends WHERE dividend_amount >= 0.5 ORDER BY dividend_amount DESC, ex_dividend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY close_price ASC, date DESC;
SELECT ticker_symbol, date, close_price FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT s.ticker_symbol, s.date, s.close_price, m.company_name FROM stock_prices s JOIN stock_metadata m ON s.ticker_symbol = m.ticker_symbol WHERE m.sector = 'Technology';
SELECT s.ticker_symbol, s.date, d.dividend_amount FROM stock_prices s JOIN stock_dividends d ON s.ticker_symbol = d.ticker_symbol WHERE d.ex_dividend_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close, volume FROM StockPrices WHERE date = '2022-10-25';
SELECT symbol, high, low FROM StockPrices WHERE close > 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT company_name, sector FROM StockSymbols WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT * FROM StockDividends WHERE dividend_amount > 0.5 ORDER BY ex_dividend_date DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, open, close FROM StockPrices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM StockSymbols WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(high) AS max_high FROM StockPrices GROUP BY symbol HAVING max_high > 100;

SELECT StockSymbols.symbol, StockSymbols.company_name, StockDividends.ex_dividend_date, StockDividends.dividend_amount FROM StockSymbols INNER JOIN StockDividends ON StockSymbols.symbol = StockDividends.symbol WHERE StockDividends.dividend_amount > 0.5;

SELECT StockSectors.sector_name, AVG(StockPrices.close) AS avg_close FROM StockSectors LEFT JOIN StockSymbols ON StockSectors.sector_id = StockSymbols.sector LEFT JOIN StockPrices ON StockSymbols.symbol = StockPrices.symbol GROUP BY StockSectors.sector_name ORDER BY avg_close DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_quantity FROM stocks WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, date_of_purchase FROM stocks WHERE date_of_purchase > '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, stock_quantity FROM stocks LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, stock_quantity FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT stock_id, stock_symbol, date_of_purchase FROM stocks WHERE date_of_purchase BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_purchase ASC;

SELECT s.stock_name, sp.price, st.transaction_type FROM stocks s JOIN stock_prices sp ON s.stock_id = sp.stock_id JOIN stock_transactions st ON s.stock_id = st.stock_id WHERE st.transaction_type = 'Buy';
